<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the current position in the progress bar.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''progressPosition''' control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control:  [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_pos = [[progressPosition]] _control;</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[progressSetPosition]], [[ctrlScrollValues]], [[sliderPosition]]. [[progressLoadingScreen]]
</value></part></template>
